pages.text: An Automoton is a kind of robot, capable of executing instructions, carrying a head, holding items, rotating, and moving.$(br2)Twelve slots are reserved for instructions in the form of items called modules, which are executed in a loop.
A head can be placed in them, which modifies its behaviour, as detailed in their own entries. Hoppers and players can interact with its extra slot.

The automoton GUI shows the direction that the automoton is facing, whether it's currently engaged, and how it handles errors. Engagement and error handling is described in other entries in this category.
